text: Impatiens etindensis is a species of flowering plant in the family Balsaminaceae. It is endemic to Cameroon, where it is known only from Mount Cameroon. It grows as an epiphyte on trees in mountain forest habitat.Cheek, M. and S. Cable. 2000. Impatiens etindensis. In: IUCN 2013. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2013.1. Downloaded on 03 July 2013. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Cameroon Category:Plants described in 2009 etindensis Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Impatiens etindensis
